docs.title: miga
docs.text:
A minimal data schema to increase the transparency of grant applications, while protecting their confidentiality and the privacy of their applicants.

  • Auto-generated schema documentation

docs.title: About miga
docs.text: A minimal data schema to increase the transparency of grant applications, while protecting their confidentiality and the privacy of their applicants.

docs.title: Minimal Information on Grant Applications (MIGA)
docs.text:
A minimal data schema to increase the transparency of grant applications, while protecting their confidentiality and the privacy of their applicants.

URI: https://w3id.org/miga

Name: miga

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description GrantApplication A research grant application ReviewScore Final score or score for a specific criterion, step, and/or reviewer

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description application_year Year the application was submitted, or year the grant scheme was published criterion Criterion being evaluated discipline Organizational division (panel, directorate, office grant_scheme The funding scheme under which the grant was applied pi_age Age or age range of the principal investigator pi_gender Gender of the principal investigator, with enumerations for male and female, ... reviewer Anonymized identifier of the reviewer, e score Numeric score assigned scores One or more scores assigned during the review process step Numeric representation of the stage or phase in the grant review process (e success Whether the application was successful

docs.title: Enumerations
docs.text: Enumeration Description GenderEnum Gender of a person, based on https://schema

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description AgeRange Age range in string format (e AgeValue Age as integer Boolean A binary (true or false) value Curie a compact URI Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Jsonpath A string encoding a JSON Path Jsonpointer A string encoding a JSON Pointer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model Sparqlpath A string encoding a SPARQL Property Path String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.title: Type: AgeRange
docs.text:
Age range in string format (e.g. "35-45" with hyphen or "35–45" with en dash).

URI: xsd:string

  • base: string

  • uri: xsd:string

  • pattern: ^\d+\s*[-–]\s*\d+$

docs.title: Enum: GenderEnum
docs.text:
Gender of a person, based on https://schema.org/Gender

URI: miga:GenderEnum

docs.title: Permissible Values
docs.text: Value Meaning Description MALE schema:Male FEMALE schema:Female

docs.title: Schema Source
docs.text: • from schema: https://w3id.org/miga

docs.title: LinkML Source
docs.text:
name: GenderEnum
description: Gender of a person, based on https://schema.org/Gender
from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
rank: 1000
permissible_values:
  MALE:
    text: MALE
    meaning: schema:Male
  FEMALE:
    text: FEMALE
    meaning: schema:Female

docs.title: Class: GrantApplication
docs.text:
A research grant application.

URI: miga:GrantApplication

 classDiagram
    class GrantApplication
    click GrantApplication href "../GrantApplication/"
      GrantApplication : application_year

      GrantApplication : discipline

      GrantApplication : grant_scheme

      GrantApplication : pi_age

      GrantApplication : pi_gender

      GrantApplication : scores





        GrantApplication --> "*" ReviewScore : scores
        click ReviewScore href "../ReviewScore/"



      GrantApplication : success

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance pi_age 0..1  String or AgeRange or AgeValue Age or age range of the principal investigator direct pi_gender 0..1  String or GenderEnum or String Gender of the principal investigator, with enumerations for male and female, ... direct application_year 0..1  Integer Year the application was submitted, or year the grant scheme was published direct grant_scheme 0..1  String The funding scheme under which the grant was applied direct discipline 0..1  String Organizational division (panel, directorate, office direct scores *  ReviewScore One or more scores assigned during the review process direct success 0..1  Boolean Whether the application was successful direct

docs.title: Schema Source
docs.text: • from schema: https://w3id.org/miga

docs.title: Mappings
docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self miga:GrantApplication native miga:GrantApplication

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
name: GrantApplication
description: A research grant application.
from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
slots:
- pi_age
- pi_gender
- application_year
- grant_scheme
- discipline
- scores
- success
tree_root: true

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: GrantApplication
description: A research grant application.
from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
attributes:
  pi_age:
    name: pi_age
    description: Age or age range of the principal investigator.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: pi_age
    owner: GrantApplication
    domain_of:
    - GrantApplication
    range: string
    any_of:
    - range: AgeRange
    - range: AgeValue
  pi_gender:
    name: pi_gender
    description: Gender of the principal investigator, with enumerations for male
      and female, while allowing other values as well (e.g. "Non-binary", "Other"...).
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: pi_gender
    owner: GrantApplication
    domain_of:
    - GrantApplication
    range: string
    any_of:
    - range: GenderEnum
    - range: string
  application_year:
    name: application_year
    description: Year the application was submitted, or year the grant scheme was
      published.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: application_year
    owner: GrantApplication
    domain_of:
    - GrantApplication
    range: integer
  grant_scheme:
    name: grant_scheme
    description: The funding scheme under which the grant was applied.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: grant_scheme
    owner: GrantApplication
    domain_of:
    - GrantApplication
    range: string
  discipline:
    name: discipline
    description: Organizational division (panel, directorate, office...) that represents
      the discipline of the application. The most granular division should always
      be preferred.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: discipline
    owner: GrantApplication
    domain_of:
    - GrantApplication
    range: string
  scores:
    name: scores
    description: One or more scores assigned during the review process. A single score
      can be interpreted as the final score.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: scores
    owner: GrantApplication
    domain_of:
    - GrantApplication
    range: ReviewScore
    multivalued: true
  success:
    name: success
    description: Whether the application was successful.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: success
    owner: GrantApplication
    domain_of:
    - GrantApplication
    range: boolean
tree_root: true

docs.title: Class: ReviewScore
docs.text:

docs.title: Induced
docs.text:
name: ReviewScore
description: Final score or score for a specific criterion, step, and/or reviewer.
from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
slot_usage:
  score:
    name: score
    range: float
attributes:
  reviewer:
    name: reviewer
    description: Anonymized identifier of the reviewer, e.g. R1, R2...
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: reviewer
    owner: ReviewScore
    domain_of:
    - ReviewScore
    range: string
    required: false
  step:
    name: step
    description: Numeric representation of the stage or phase in the grant review
      process (e.g. "1" for the initial screening, "2" for the panel review...).
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: step
    owner: ReviewScore
    domain_of:
    - ReviewScore
    range: integer
    required: false
  criterion:
    name: criterion
    description: Criterion being evaluated.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: criterion
    owner: ReviewScore
    domain_of:
    - ReviewScore
    range: string
    required: false
  score:
    name: score
    description: Numeric score assigned.
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/miga
    rank: 1000
    alias: score
    owner: ReviewScore
    domain_of:
    - ReviewScore
    range: float
    required: true

  (e.g. "1" for the initial screening, "2" for the panel review...).

alias: step
domain_of:
- ReviewScore
range: integer
required: false
